SPONSORSHIP OPPORTUNITIES

WE'RE ACCEPTING BOTH MONETARY AND IN-KIND CONTRIBUTIONS.

BUILDING SOLUTIONS TO HELP MAKE THE WORLD A BETTER PLACE.

HEADLINING SPONSOR $8,000 GOAL

  • EXCLUSIVITY - event referred to as "Space Apps Challenge NYC in Association with [Company]"
  • All Title-level benefits
  • Your Company name appears first in all communications
  • Logo displayed 2x larger and next to logos for event organizers
  • 5 minutes each of opening and closing remarks on global live-stream (must be non-commercial, no endorsements)

TITLE SPONSOR $5,000 GOAL

  • Name and logo on print materials, emails, announcements, event website, t-shirts, live-stream, post-event recaps, and social media
  • 2 minutes each of opening and closing remarks on global live-stream (must be non-commercial, no endorsements)
  • Opportunity to hang banners on-site
